mapper.select: select s.id deptId from HNJBZ_CHANNEL_USER t inner join HNJBZ_USER_WHITE b on t.binding_phone = b.phone inner join HNJBZ_ORG s on b.org_id = s.id and s.org_level = '5' where t.openid = #{openid}

select s.parent_id companyId from HNJBZ_CHANNEL_USER t inner join HNJBZ_USER_WHITE b on t.binding_phone = b.phone inner join HNJBZ_ORG s on b.org_id = s.id and s.org_level = '5' where t.openid = #{openid}

select o.parent_id branchId from HNJBZ_CHANNEL_USER t inner join HNJBZ_USER_WHITE b on t.binding_phone = b.phone inner join HNJBZ_ORG s on b.org_id = s.id and s.org_level = '5' inner join HNJBZ_ORG o on o.id = s.parent_id and o.org_level = '4' where t.openid = #{openid}
